@smakosh @Netlify @gatsbyjs Aha. When you submit the form data, you've omitted the recaptcha value. So your form submission would be viewed as spam and ignored. https://t.co/sARIpW2Mlp The reference examples submits everything, including the global recapture value. See here: https://t.co/ZzRyshZ7aR
